main event: A bright object similar to a satellite was observed at 30 degrees elevation on a course of 170 degrees.
interesting points: The object was observed from a ship (USCGC MATAGORDA) at the coordinates 33-39.5N 164-82.9E.
The observation was reported through a military messaging system, indicating it was likely considered a significant or unusual sighting.
The object's position angle was reported as 38 degrees, and its course was 179 degrees.
The weather was reported as clear, and the sea was calm at the time of the observation.
No photographs were taken of the object, and its nature remained unknown.
sighted object: a bright object similar to a satellite
